Posts.Content: Hi all.  I have been asked by my cancer doc to join a trial of Goserelin injections, to try to slow down/prevent my ER+ breast cancer returning.  But after reading up on possible side effects, im unsure I want to. Has anyone had any experience with them?  Thanks.
Posts.Title: Goserelin injection trial

Posts.Content: Thank you so much for the replys.  Im currently taking tamoxifen, but the onco said that they are trialling the injection in place of it (for primary cancers) and so far have found that it can slow down the regrowth/prevent it coming back by upto 30% in comparrison.  I was unsure if I wanted to put myself through more treatment for a small percentage if the side effects where large (im only 35 so the potential heart and bone problems put me off a bit).  More dreaded what ifs I guess.  I do feel slightly better now from your comments, so thank you.  Oh and congratulations on becomming a grandmother how exciting xxx
Posts.Title: Goserelin injection trial
